Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_MallCooperationSetting' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'rakuten_sku_management_id_output_format_for_normal') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_MallCooperationSetting ADD rakuten_sku_management_id_output_format_for_normal NVARCHAR(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_MallCooperationSetting' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'rakuten_sku_management_id_output_format_for_variation') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_MallCooperationSetting ADD rakuten_sku_management_id_output_format_for_variation NVARCHAR(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO
